title: Andrew Bridgen – 2021 Comments on John Bercow
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Andrew Bridgen, the Conservative MP for North West Leicestershire, on 20 June 2021.
content: John Bercow is a former member of the Monday Club, which supported apartheid and used the slogan “Hang Nelson Mandela”.
I can tell you that I would never have joined the Monday Club in a month of Sundays, the Labour Party is where he belongs.
